Name: Economics Lesson for Kids: Definition & Terms
Subject: ['politics', 'children', 'education', 'law, govt and politics', 'family and parenting', 'homework and study tips']
Description: Economics is one of the most important fields in the world, as it is the understanding of economics that can help make a person, a company, or even a country a wealthy place. Come and learn what economics is as well as some basic terms.
